item.title: Reddit is removing moderators that protest by taking their communities private
item.description: - Reddit CEO plans to change the policy for removing moderators, making it easier for users to vote them out if they are unpopular.

item.title: Full Time
item.description: - The author has decided to work on Marginalia Search full time, leaving their office job.

item.title: Reddit appears to be restoring edited/deleted comments
item.description: - Reddit is apparently restoring edited or deleted comments.

item.title: Reddit App â€“ Suspicious high number of recent 5 star, one word reviews
item.description: - The Reddit App on the Google Play Store has received a suspiciously high number of recent 5-star, one-word reviews.

item.title: Daniel Ellsberg has died
item.description: - Daniel Ellsberg, the man responsible for leaking the Pentagon Papers, has passed away at the age of 92.

item.title: Pricing Money: A beginner's guide to money, bonds, futures & swaps
item.description: - "Pricing Money" is a beginner's guidebook that covers various topics including money markets, government bonds, futures, swaps, options, and foreign exchange.

item.title: Louis Rossmann calls community to leave Reddit
item.description: - Louis Rossmann, a well-known tech YouTuber and repair advocate, has called for the community to leave Reddit, a popular online platform for discussions and communities.

item.title: The note Reddit sent to moderators threatening them if they don't reopen
item.description: - Reddit sent messages to moderators of protesting communities, urging them to reopen their subreddits or face potential mod removals.

item.title: European Union votes to bring back replaceable phone batteries
item.description: - The European Union has voted in favor of new legislation that would require batteries in consumer devices like smartphones to be easily removable and replaceable.

item.title: DevOps Is Bullshit (2022)
item.description: - DevOps started as a set of practices and culture but has become divisive and narrow-focused.
